name: Curse of the Hodag
description:
Classic Arcade Fun     

Smash through wood fences and clear a path through the park in this arcade classic brick breaking style game!

With a Little Twist

     Of course, it's never that simple.  An ancient creature of folklore, the Hodag, has heard the commotion and come to stir up mischief.  Watch out for the turtles they throw at you and the snakes they spit, they carry debilitating consequences.  If they touch your paddle, it could shrink, freeze, or disappear all together!

Push Your Luck in Hardcore Mode

     Try to rack up the highest score on each level, or go for the ultimate high score in Hardcore mode.

   This is the first game I've ever made.  I admit, there is still a lot I could do to polish it off, but I am excited and ready to move on to my next project.
